PageTitle: mpls te bfd tunnel enable auto-primary-tunnel
FuncDef:
The mpls te bfd tunnel enable auto-primary-tunnel command enables BFD for TE tunnel globally for a primary tunnel that is automatically established.
The undo mpls te bfd tunnel enable auto-primary-tunnel command restores the default path calculation function.
By default, BFD for TE tunnel is disabled globally for a primary tunnel that is automatically established.
CLIs: mpls te bfd tunnel enable auto-primary-tunnel { pce-initiated-lsp | segment-routing }
mpls te bfd tunnel enable one-arm-echo
undo mpls te bfd tunnel enable auto-primary-tunnel { pce-initiated-lsp | segment-routing }
undo mpls te bfd tunnel enable one-arm-echo

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the one arm echo mode BFD.
-

Examples: [*HUAWEI-mpls] mpls te bfd tunnel enable auto-primary-tunnel segment-routing
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
PCEP can trigger the establishment of RSVP-TE and SR-MPLS TE tunnel:
To enable BFD for RSVP-TE tunnel , run the mpls te bfd tunnel enable auto-primary-tunnel pce-initiated-lsp command.To enable BFD for SR-MPLS TE tunnel , run the mpls te bfd tunnel enable auto-primary-tunnel segment-routing command.
